thread.title: Ram says Shivam's audio to be a hit
thread.title_full: Ram says Shivam's audio to be a hit - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Ram says Shivam's audio to be a hit
text: Energetic hero Ram, is on a high after the success of Pandaga Chesko. He is now back with yet another commercial entertainer Shivam, which is slated for a massive release this week. On this occasion, we caught up with him for a brief interview. "The songs in Shivam will be a visual treat for everyone. We have shot them in some exotic locations of Norway and DSP's thumping music is an added advantage for the film," said the actor.
